summary: A businessman is murdered at his home. Experienced police Inspector Chávez uses a rookie officer as a bait to catch the killer, while struggling with his own deepest desires.
cast: Demián Bichir|Chino Darín|Carlos Casella|Mónica Antonópulos|Emilio Disi|Jorgelina Aruzzi|Hugo Arana|Luisa Kuliok|Humberto Tortonese|Gino Renni|Fabián Arenillas|Maxi Diorio|Nehuen Penzotti|Martín Wullich|Arturo Goetz|Brenda Senlle|Sandra Villani|Julio Graham|Manuel Longueira|Jimena Del Pozo|Oscar Gutierrez|Ramón Morinigo|Fernando Ritucci|Carlos Petrucci|Rafael Solano|Ariel Chavarría|Cesar Román|Ignacio Acevedo|Matías Princ|Martín Cutino|Daniel Cabot|Gustavo Couto|Aldo Onofri|Javier Chmea|Raquel Pinhasoff|Federico Mirré|Rafael De Simone|Javier Araya|Mario Acenjo|Ariel Matías Morosín|Anabella Bacigalupo|Sandra Moranchel|Déborah Vidret|Diego Stanga|Nicolás Berrueta|Andrés Rosso|Federico Schneeberger|Ignacio Saraceni|Ariel Sandez|Juan Arnaldi|Federico Acquistapasce|Fernando Ibarra|Federico Moreno|Juan Cid Cid|Javier Marra|Nicolás Poggi|Franco La Pietra|Juan Velazquez Cardone|Leandro Otero|Leandro Appugliese|Carlos Borda Cano|Javier Maestro|Anibal Nicolás Riquelme
title: Muerte en Buenos Aires
